Package vista.report

Class Summary
AppProps Properties for the application.
AppUtils contains the common utility functions
DefaultFrame A default frame understands MPanel's.
GuiUtils  
MonthlyReport Generates formatted text in an array of strings each element of which represents one line of the report
MonthlyTableDisplay  
MPanel This panel has a menu bar associated with it.
RAppUtils contains the common utility functions
ReportPane Just a way to force it to set page width??
ReportUtils A set of utility functions for writing out text aligned in columns of a line.
TextDisplay  
TSDataAttr A set of data attributes that contains original units field.
TSMath
